title: In New Book, Pence Reflects on Trump and Jan. 6
description: “You’re too honest,” President Donald J. Trump said as he pressured his vice president to intervene to block Joseph R. Biden Jr.’s victory.
dc:creator: Maggie Haberman

media:content.media:description: Vice President Mike Pence and President Donald Trump during a rally in November 2020. In a new book, Mr. Pence describes the president’s pressure campaign on him to intervene in certifying the election.
